soft.name: Communication
soft.description: Effective in both written and verbal communication, able to explain complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.

soft.name: Problem-Solving
soft.description: Strong analytical skills with a methodical approach to troubleshooting and resolving issues.

soft.name: Teamwork
soft.description: Collaborative team player, experienced in working with cross-functional teams to deliver projects.

soft.name: Adaptability
soft.description: Quick learner, able to adapt to new technologies and methodologies in the ever-evolving tech landscape.

soft.name: Time Management
soft.description: Efficient in prioritizing tasks and managing multiple projects simultaneously to meet deadlines.
